text.en: Namo guru!
text.en-trans: namo guru

text.en: Great Vajradhara, Tilopa and Nāropa,
text.en-trans: dorjé chang chen telo naro dang

text.en: Marpa, Mila, Dakpo and all the other gurus
text.en-trans: mar mi dakpo tatsa dri tak ling

text.en: Of the Four Kagyü lineages—Tatsa,1Drikung, Taktsang and Lingré,2
text.en-trans: ka zhi gyüpé lama tamché kyi

text.en: Inspire us with your blessings here and now, I pray.
text.en-trans: dengdir dak sok jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: The successors of Düsum Khyenpa in particular,
text.en-trans: khyepar drenda kündral trulpé ku

text.en: That nirmāṇakāya who is entirely without equal,
text.en-trans: dü sum khyenpé ku yi kyerab treng

text.en: To all these garland-like incarnations, I pray:
text.en-trans: rimpar jönpa kün la solwa deb

text.en: Inspire us with your blessings here and now.
text.en-trans: dengdir dak sok jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: From the palace that is the display of blissful power and wrath,
text.en-trans: dechen wang drak rolpé podrang né

text.en: Great fulfiller of the activity of the buddhas of the three times,
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwé trinlépa chenpo

text.en: Magnificent adept Chökyi Lama, to you I pray:3
text.en-trans: drubchen chökyi lamar solwa deb

text.en: Inspire us with your blessings here and now.
text.en-trans: dengdir dak sok jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: In enlightened form, you are the great Padma Heruka,
text.en-trans: ku ni pema heruka chenpo

text.en: Your speech resonating with the great mantra sound of audible emptiness,
text.en-trans: sung ni drak tong ngak kyi drachen drok

text.en: And your wisdom mind the great clear light of all-pervading dharmadhātu—
text.en-trans: tuk ni chöying künkhyab ösal ché

text.en: Guru Karmapa, to you I pray:
text.en-trans: lama karmapa la solwa deb

text.en: Inspire us with your blessings here and now.
text.en-trans: dengdir dak sok jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Your splendour overwhelms the whole animate and inanimate world, appearance and existence,
text.en-trans: tenyo nangsi tamché zil gyi nön

text.en: Your wisdom form resplendent in its dance of emanation and absorption,
text.en-trans: yeshe ku ni trodü gar gyi ji

text.en: Your realization unchanging, and as pure and vast as space—
text.en-trans: gongpa mingyur kha tar dak ching yang

text.en: Great lord of yogins, to you I pray:
text.en-trans: naljor wangchuk chenpor solwa deb

text.en: Inspire us with your blessings here and now.
text.en-trans: dengdir dak sok jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Enemy of all thedamsiandgyalgongspirits of this degenerate age,
text.en-trans: nyikdü damsi gyalgong kün gyi shé

text.en: Guru who embodies all the deities of the maṇḍala
text.en-trans: lama palchen drakpö kyilkhor pa

text.en: Of the glorious and wrathful, Karmapa—
text.en-trans: jinyé chik tu düpé karmapa

text.en: Great Pakshi, at your feet I pray:
text.en-trans: pakshi chenpö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Inspire us with your blessings here and now.
text.en-trans: dengdir wangkur jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Inspire us to pacify sickness, obstructing forces and harm.
text.en-trans: nedön nöpa zhiwar jingyi lob

text.en: Inspire us to practise Dharma for the full duration of our lives.
text.en-trans: tsé chö taru chinpar jingyi lob

text.en: Inspire us to stabilize the absorptions of generation and perfection.
text.en-trans: kyedzok tingdzin tenpar jingyi lob

text.en: Inspire us to realize the dharmakāya nature of our own minds.
text.en-trans: rangsem chökur tokpar jingyi lob

text.en: Inspire us to emulate you, the guru.
text.en-trans: lama khyé dang nyampar jingyi lob
